entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You helped Kaiya Merel against her rival, a Meatlump lieutenant named Stephax Dain. In doing so, she has initiated you into the Meatlumps.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr has asked you to find a way into the Meatlump Hideout. First, you must find out where it is. To that end, you are trying to gain the confidence of a Meatlump lieutenant to infiltrate their ranks.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Kaiya Merel wants you to help her against a rival Meatlump lieutenant named Stephax Dain. Word is that he has something big planned. Go to his camp outside of Kor Vella and find out what he's planning.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Stephax Dain is planning an attack on a weapons research facility under contract to the Empire. Kaiya wants you to beat him to it and take out the facility yourself. Instead, you are going to take out Stephax and his gang of Meatlumps.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Kaiya and let her know that Stephax Dain and his gang didnt make it.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Vani Korr and let her know that you have access to the Meatlump Hideout, which is there in Coronet.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Defeat Meatlump pronks from Stephax Dain's gang.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Defeat Stephax Dain, a Meatlump lieutenant who is a rival to Kaiya Merel.
